title: Symone Sanders, Top Aide to Vice President Kamala Harris, to Leave Team
sub_head: She is the second senior staffer to announce a departure from the White House
body:
Symone Sanders, senior adviser and chief spokeswoman to Vice President Kamala Harris, is planning to leave the White House at the end of the year, a White House official said.
Ms. Sanders worked for Ms. Harris during the general election campaign and during the transition.
